definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: When Bela died, Jobab son of Zerah from Bozrah succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 比拉死了，波斯拉人谢拉的儿子约巴接续他作王。

sentences.english: And Manasseh his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子玛拿西接续他作王。

sentences.english: And Jehoash his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子约阿施接续他作王。

sentences.english: And Ahaziah his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子亚哈谢接续他作王。

sentences.english: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of Temani reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 约巴死了，毯螅地的人户珊接续他作王。

sentences.english: And Rehoboam his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子罗波安接续他作王。

sentences.english: When Jobab died, Husham from the land of the Temanites succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 约巴死了，提幔地的人户珊接续他作王。

sentences.english: When Shaul died, Baal-Hanan son of Acbor succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗死了，亚革波的儿子巴勒哈南接续他作王。

sentences.english: In the course of time, Nahash king of the Ammonites died, and his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 此后，亚扪人的王拿辖死了，他儿子接续他作王。

sentences.english: And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 扫罗死了，亚革波的儿子巴勒哈南接续他作王。

sentences.english: When Baal-Hanan son of Acbor died, Hadad succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 亚革波的儿子巴勒哈南死了，哈达接续他作王。

sentences.english: And Abijah his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子亚比雅接续他作王。

sentences.english: And the people of the land took Jehoahaz son of Josiah and anointed him and made him king in place of his father.
sentences.chinese: 国民膏约西亚的儿子约哈斯接续他父亲作王。

sentences.english: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 约巴死了，毯螅地的人户珊接续他作王。

sentences.english: Number the footnotes consecutively within the same chapter and start over in new ones.
sentences.chinese: 各章内编号连续，各章之间不相接续。

sentences.english: And Jehoiachin his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子约雅斤接续他作王。

definition: to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son)/to inherit
to access (a network)/to insert (a plug) into (a socket)
to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span
